alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:20PM CDT until June 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BOX BUTTE...SOUTHWESTERN DAWES AND SOUTHEASTERN SIOUX COUNTIES... At 320 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Flahertys Corner, or 34 miles southwest of Chadron, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hemingford, Box Butte Campground, Flahertys Corner, Box Butte Dam and Marsland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
